headline: One platform. Every property. Zero chaos.
subheadline: Everything you need to scale your property business—without the spreadsheet chaos.

items.title: AI-Powered Templates
items.description: Generate contracts and forms in seconds—customized to your property type and local regulations.

items.title: Any Property, Any Term
items.description: Short-term rentals, long-term leases, commercial—manage them all from a single dashboard.

items.title: Seamless Onboarding
items.description: Invite tenants, guests, and property owners with frictionless digital workflows.

items.title: Request Tracking
items.description: Maintenance requests, tenant inquiries, owner approvals—tracked and organized automatically.

items.description: Record, track, and reconcile payments without the spreadsheet gymnastics.
